mapper.select: SELECT r.relay_id relayId, r.title title, TO_CHAR(r.cover) cover, r.age age FROM relay r INNER JOIN submission s ON r.relay_id = s.relay_id WHERE r.is_end = 1 AND s.is_selected = 1 ORDER BY r.relay_id
SELECT r.relay_id relayId, r.title title, TO_CHAR(r.cover) cover, r.age age FROM relay r WHERE r.is_end = #{filter} ORDER BY r.relay_id

SELECT r.relay_id relayId, s.submission_id submissionId, s.week week, m.username, s.content, TO_CHAR(s.sketch) sketch FROM relay r JOIN submission s ON r.relay_id = s.relay_id JOIN member m ON s.member_id = m.member_id WHERE r.relay_id = #{relayId} AND r.is_end = 1 AND s.is_selected = 1 ORDER BY s.submission_id

SELECT r1.relayId, r1.title, TO_CHAR(r1.cover) AS cover, r1.age FROM ( SELECT r2.relay_id AS relayId, r2.title AS title, r2.cover AS cover, r2.age AS age, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY r2.startdate DESC) AS row_num FROM relay r2 WHERE r2.is_end = 1 ) r1 WHERE r1.row_num > ((#{pageNum} - 1) * #{pageSize}) AND r1.row_num <= (#{pageNum} * #{pageSize})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM relay WHERE is_end = 1
